channel.title: [Hyperion] CounterPlay [Hyperion]
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt][font=times new roman]CounterPlay[/font][/size][/b]
[url=http://www.counterplay.info]Website[/url]
Base : SabSabi 459
This project is basically going to be a learning project to learn more and more about Hyperion.
[B]Media[/B]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1ygu9[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1yl21[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1yl2Q[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1ym51[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1ym8b[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1yLXu[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1yM3n[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1yM5I[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1zQ5p[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1yBPe[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1Dk08[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1Dk3A[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1DkbX[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1AdhE[/img]
[B]Updates[/B]
[CODE][7/12/2012] - Switched to SabSabi 459 [7/12/2012] - Started Firemaking [8/12/2012] - Started Thieving [8/12/2012] - Jewelry teleportation nearly finished [8/12/2012] - Many more bosses added; KBD, DKS, Kalphite queen etc... [8/12/2012] - Bones on altar completed [8/12/2012] - Alot more prayers added [8/12/2012] - More locations populated [8/12/2012] - Most npc's are pickpocketable a few left. [8/12/2012] - Ardougne stalls added [8/12/2012] - Stalls will lose items for a few seconds after stealing [8/12/2012] - Npc's will stun you [8/12/2012] - Guards will attack you if caught stealing from stalls
[9/12/2012] - Pickpocketing is about 85% [9/12/2012] - Main cities like Ardougne, Falador, Varrock etc.. are now populated [9/12/2012] - Started to work on a pest control base [9/12/2012] - Many stalls around the world are now thieve able [9/12/2012] - Spells like vengeance, vengeance other etc.. have been added
[11/12/2012] - Ores added, [Copper, Tin, Coal, Clay, Etc...] [11/12/2012] - Mineral deplete after being mined [11/12/2012] - All pickaxes working upto Rune [11/12/2012] - Many locations added [11/12/2012] - Timer is based on your level 11/12/2012] - You will mine much faster with a better pickaxe
[12/12/2012] - Degrading added [12/12/2012] - Dharok's effect added [12/12/2012] - Verac's effect added
[20/12/2012] - Skillcape Emotes added with timers [20/12/2012] - Crafting nearly completed [20/12/2012] - Herblore started, a few potions added[/CODE]
Support Signature
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1xDOA[/img]
[CODE][IMG]http://puu.sh/1xDOA[/img][/CODE][/center]

item.title: [Hyperion] CounterPlay [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:30, topic:471892”]@Herblore

It looks good, but in the Text String you should add the name of the Herb Identified.

Also, you can do whatever you want, but I’d change the Text to read:

"You identify the Herb as a " + ID_NAME_HERB + “.”

None of that is needed, I just thought it would make it more visually appealing.

EDIT: Do you have Animation overlapping?[/quote]

Yeah im planning to work on herblore a bit more later.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] CounterPlay [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

rooneyscape:

Thanks, forgot to mention that it is added.

You’re welcome. Here’s something from our Mining you might want to use or take from:

Pickaxes: Every Pickaxe from Iron to Rune will eventually wear out and break, except for the Bronze Pickaxe. Each Pickaxe must reach a certain time of use before it is eligible to break. This time varies based upon a few factors including: Mining level, Pickaxe type, and Strength level.
Bronze Pickaxe: The Bronze Pickaxe is an artifact just like all other Bronze Equipment and Items. This Pickaxe cannot be equipped. When you gain Mining experience with the Bronze Pickaxe in your Inventory, 25% of the experience gained is contributed to your Smithing skill. This Pickaxe has no requirements to use, never breaks, and has the fastest Mining speed in-game. Your Prospecting time is also instant no matter your Mining level when the Bronze Pickaxe is in your Inventory.

Read full topic
